text: Hugon, The Mighty is a lost The Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:..Hugon, The Mighty 1918 silent film Northwoods drama directed by Rollin S. Sturgeon and starring Monroe Salisbury. It was produced by Bluebird Photoplays and released through Universal Film Manufacturing Company.
